text: Michael Corrente (born April 6, 1959) is an American film director and producer. His films include A Shot at Glory, American Buffalo, Outside Providence, Brooklyn Rules and Federal Hill. Federal Hill won the Audience Award in 1994 at France's Deauville Film Festival before being picked up for release by Trimark
